name: Klipsch ProMedia 2.1 120 W 2.1-Channel Speakers
Features: [Maximum Acoustic Output: 106dB SPL, Amplifier: Digital/Linear A/B amplifier with discrete MOSFET output power section, Satellites: Two-way system using 0.75" polymer dome tweeter with a MicroTractrix Horn and one 3" long-throw midBass driver, Subwoofer: Side-firing 6.5" long-throw driver]
